name: You and What ARMy?
description:
Someone stole the bones in your arms!

Play as Kung Fu legend, Ronnie Fists, in this comedic, slapstick, and over-the-top, quest to get them back!

Inspired by the so-bad-they're-good martial arts films of the 1970's, You and What ARMy? is a 15-minute-fever-dream full of breakable set pieces, colorful characters, and cheesy one-liners that are sure to make you laugh AND groan!

So sit back, grab your controller, and get ready to flail your floppy, boneless arms around like a crazy person!
